mapper.insert: insert into hotplace(htitle, hcontent, hdate, hcount, haddr, hphoto, hlat, hlng) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{date}, #{count}, #{address}, #{photo}, #{latitude}, #longitude})
mapper.select:
select h.hno, h.htitle, h.hcontent, h.hdate, h.hcount, h.haddr, h.hphoto, h.hlat, h.hlng
from hotplace h
order by h.hno desc
